body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install intel-mpi %gcc@9.3.0
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-1422-6c2e14dfc
* **Python:** 3.4.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-broadwell

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
- compiler:
    spec: gcc@9.3.0
    operating_system: centos7
    target: x86_64
    environment: {}
    modules: [gcc-9.3.0-gcc-5.4.0-5a4k4bn]
    flags: {}
    paths:
      cc: /data1/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-broadwell/gcc-5.4.0/gcc-9.3.0-5a4k4bnanp2sow3eqnhf2ybopjzsrbsu/bin/gcc
      fc: /data1/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-broadwell/gcc-5.4.0/gcc-9.3.0-5a4k4bnanp2sow3eqnhf2ybopjzsrbsu/bin/gfortran
      f77: /data1/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-broadwell/gcc-5.4.0/gcc-9.3.0-5a4k4bnanp2sow3eqnhf2ybopjzsrbsu/bin/gfortran
      cxx: /data1/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-broadwell/gcc-5.4.0/gcc-9.3.0-5a4k4bnanp2sow3eqnhf2ybopjzsrbsu/bin/g++
    extra_rpaths: []

### Additional information
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4781694/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4781695/spack-build-out.txt)



### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: intel-mpi
